attributes.action: Make it illegal for the national minimum wage to be lowered by employers and accepted by those employed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today in the field of British work, many employers are abusing the human rights of there workers by offering them below the national minimum wage. This means that the receivers are being exploited also as a by- product many who will not surrender there human right to a fair minimum wage are being denied jobs.

Our fellow citizens, our fathers and grandfather fought tooth-and-nail during the 20th century to be given a national minimum wage.

Thus we ask the Prime Minister to make it an offence for employers and there workers to undermine the human rights of this nation by accepting any amount less than the national minimum wage.
